UFC star Israel Adesanya returns to Auckland court to face music for drink-driving https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/ufc-star-israel-adesanya-returns-to-auckland-court-to-face-music-for-drink-driven/GURL7PD2Q5FWXHAYOWDLAHK4FM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/ufc-star-israel-adesanya-returns-to-auckland-court-to-face-music-for-drink-driven/GURL7PD2Q5FWXHAYOWDLAHK4FM/ Craig KapitanHe pleaded guilty at his first appearance in September. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 04:06:35 +0000 UFC star Israel Adesanya sits in the dock at Auckland District Court while requesting a discharge without conviction for drink driving. Photo / Jason Oxenham
Coroner’s water safety warnings after finding teen Valentino Laki drowned in river https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-raises-water-safety-messages-after-finding-teen-valentino-laki-drowned-in-rangitikei-river/UWNBSQL4V5EERISOB2AJGBBOQI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-raises-water-safety-messages-after-finding-teen-valentino-laki-drowned-in-rangitikei-river/UWNBSQL4V5EERISOB2AJGBBOQI/ Natalie AkoorieValentino Laki was with friends and family when he got into difficulty in 2018. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 04:03:13 +0000 Valentino Laki (left) with girlfriend Stevie Kumeroa, who described the 16-year-old Rangitīkei College student as free-spirited. Laki, also know as Valentino Malo, drowned while swimming in a river in January 2018.
